Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time between Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation and SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed to be done after Manuscript Export Succeeded
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total waiting time to the SW-Checklist Completed following Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Time from SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days to SW-Checklist Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Checklist Completed across variants ending in SW-EIC Reject
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Average time it takes SW-Checklist Completed after Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded compared to after standard Plagiarism Originality Report Completed
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Plagiarism Percent Match Threshold Exceeded' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Cycle Time of SW-Checklist Completed in cases that proceed to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection versus those that end early with Immediate Reject Decision from the Checklist
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and the end of case where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection occurs

Name: Time of SW-Checklist Completed in submissions involving Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission versus those without
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Total time between SW-Checklist Completed and SW-Awaiting AE Assignment to assess downstream impact on editor assignment latency
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Average time until SW-Checklist Completed is performed in variants that include reminder or escalation activities (e.g., SW-Checklist Completion now due)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completion now due' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Elapsed time between Manuscript Export Succeeded and SW-Checklist Completed in manuscripts that later undergo Major Revision versus those accepted directly
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Time from SW-Checklist Completed to the first occurrence of SW-AE Assign Reviewers, highlighting its role as a gateway to reviewer assignment
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Checklist Completed' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Minimum time from Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation to SW-Checklist Completed in high-performance variants (performance < 200000)
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'
